DOC.brief_summary: A chinese study shows that chinese population eyes with a primary angle closure have a greater choroidal thickness than normal eyes.The increase of choroidal thickness would be associated to this primary angle closure.
DOC.brief_title: Choroidal Thickness Association With Primary Angle Closure
DOC.detailed_description: Usual ophtalmic consultation for glaucoma with primary angle closure
DOC.criteria: Age >18 years Primary angle closure confirmed by gonioscopy interpretable images for choroidal thickness measure interpretable images by Ultra Bio Microscopy (UBM) Acute crisis for angle closure Rethinopathy (diabetic or hypertensive) Histories of intraeye surgery Great myopia Hypermetropia retinal pathology
